item.title: University Reveals Grand Theft Auto History College Class
item.description:
An US University will be offering a Grand Theft Auto history course starting in early 2026. The class will be the first time that a history college course has been built upon Grand Theft Auto , but not the first time that a Rockstar Games title has been the focus.

Over the course of Grand Theft Auto 's series, the games have featured different time periods, ranging from as far back as the 1960s to the present era. Grand Theft Auto Vice City brought players to the 1980s, while San Andreas was set in the 1990s. This puts Grand Theft Auto in an interesting place, where players can play the series and get a glimpse into a semi-realistic fictional depiction of what life was like in those given decades. It seems it's this aspect of the franchise that made one college professor think it was a good fit for a history course.

Accredited History Course Featuring GTA Will Be Offered at University

In January 2026, the University of Tennessee will begin offering a course called "Grand Theft America: U.S. History Since 1980 through the GTA Video Games". The course will be taught by history professor Tore Olsson, who previously offered a similar course looking at American history through the lens of Red Dead Redemption . According to Olsson, in a chat with IGN, the course will "take seriously" GTA 's version of US history, which will serve as a framing device for a history course spanning the last 45 years. The course is described as using the GTA games as a "window for understanding the social, political, economic, and cultural transformations that remade the US since 1980."

Olsson explained that American history has gone through distinctive eras, and that the GTA games serve as a sort of snapshot of what life was like at any given time. He acknowledges that the games get a lot wrong, as they're satirical and often parody real life, but that he can appreciate what they got right, and will incorporate that into the course. This includes things like the series' radio stations becoming more polarized over time, and the end of San Andreas referencing the L.A. Riots of 1992. Players won't be required to play or own the games, with the class utilizing recordings and screenshots from GTA . The professor notes that he may occasionally play the game himself for the class to make a point.

Unfortunately, this GTA course will leave out Grand Theft Auto 6 , as the game won't be out yet at that time. Olsson noted that he started planning the class to include GTA 6 , as it was slated to launch in late 2025, but that plan had to change when GTA 6 was delayed to May 2026. However, he plans to update the course once the game has released to incorporate it into the curriculum.

Grand Theft Auto 6

item.title: CoD Black Ops 7 Zombies & Campaign Voice Cast (& Where You've Heard Them)
item.description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 has revealed the main cast for BO7 Zombies and the BO7 Campaign, and we've compiled their respective actors below so that you can see who voices these iconic returning characters, and some debuting ones. Whether you're interested in seeing who voices the main crew in Black Ops 7 Zombies , or you want to put names to faces and familiar roles to the Campaign, we've got all the information you need as you prepare to embrace the madness.

Nolan North as Edward Richtofen

Who Plays Richtofen in Black Ops 7?

Edward Richtofen is the brilliantly scheming and egotistical doctor, the man who seems to always lead his crew with confidence, sadism, and a shroud of uncertainty. The crew might not trust Richtofen, but he seems to be the only one who knows what he's doing. Edward Richtofen is once again played by Nolan North, a veteran of the character who has played Richtofen since 2008's Call of Duty: World at War . Nolan North is an icon, and through the German accent of Richtofen, they might recognize his voice as Ghost from Destiny 2 , Nathan Drake from Uncharted , and practically every video game they've ever played.

Steve Blum as Tank Dempsey

Who Plays Dempsey in Black Ops 7?

Oorah! Dempsey is back, and hopefully as loud and burly as ever before. Dempsey was a stereotypical American gung-ho soldier who loved breaking the fourth wall in his Ultimis variation, but it seems this new version is a Marine who survived Vietnam. Steve Blum always brings great grit and sarcasm to Tank Dempsey, which is why it's great to see him reprise his role. Steve Blum has also played Dempsey since Call of Duty: World at War , and fans might recognize his iconic deep voice as Wolverine across various Marvel animated shows and video games (more recently, Marvel Rivals ), or as Zeb Orrelios for Star Wars: Rebels fans, and even as the English voice of Spike Spiegel in Cowboy Bebop !

Fred Tatasciore as Nikolai Belinski

Who Plays Nikolai in Black Ops 7?

Nikolai Belinski has had two variations in the past. Firstly, as a Vodka-mad and wife-killing obsessed Russian, and secondly as a hardened soldier burdened with the purpose to reset the multiverse and banish all its horrors into the Dark Aether, with himself and his friends included. Now, Nikolai returns as a Soviet tank commander, a man with immense bitterness, dark humor, and strength. These traits can be portrayed by none other than Fred Tatasciore, the man who's been voicing Nikolai since Call of Duty: World at War . Fred Tatasciore has many notable voice acting credits, like as The Hulk across many Marvel animated shows and games (more recently, Marvel Rivals), or as Megatron in Transformers: Fall of Cybertron .

Nelson Lee as Takeo Masaki

Who Plays Takeo in Black Ops 7?

Takeo Masaki has always been burdened and blinded by his own loyalties to Japan and the Emperor, but what if Takeo were disgraced? This new version of Takeo was a wandering ronin in Feudal Japan, with no master or honor to weigh him down, but that weight is replaced with a need for redemption. Sadly, Tom Kane cannot reprise his role as Takeo, a role he has been playing since Call of Duty: World at War . Tom Kane, unfortunately, suffered a stroke in 2020 and has since retired . Treyarch Studios has respectfully entrusted the role of Takeo Masaki to Nelson Lee, an actor mostly known for his live-action roles as Tony in Alex Garland's Civil War (2024) and Senator Xiono in Star Wars: Ahsoka . When it came to filling the shoes of Tom Kane, Lee had this to say:

Gene Farber as Grigori Weaver

Who Plays Weaver in Black Ops 7?

A Russian who became a CIA agent, Weaver was imperative in stopping the advancement of a nuclear armageddon, but a hero like this doesn't rest easy, especially not after a fatal mistake that cost the lives of an innocent woman and child. After fixing his mistake and making amends with Richtofen, Weaver continues to lead his hardened team through the Dark Aether in order to ensure the survival of those closest to him. Gene Farber voices Weaver once again, a role he first played in Call of Duty: Black Ops back in 2010. Fans might physically remember Gene Farber for his role as Karpov in the MCU from Captain America: Civil War (2016) and The Falcon and The Winter Soldier .

Abigail Marlowe as Elizabeth Grey

Who Plays Grey in Black Ops 7?

A brilliant scientist who was happier in her lab, years of imprisonment and isolation saw Grey adapt to survive, building her body into that of a warrior to ensure she was equal parts brain to brawn. Grey will find no comfort in the Dark Aether, not when Samantha Maxis is dead. The grief and discomfort felt by Grey will be present in Abigail Marlowe's portrayal, who voices a few characters in Arcane, like Cassandra Kiramman and Renni, along with some smaller live-action roles in Brooklyn Nine-Nine and The Equalizer 2 (2018).

Chantelle Barry as Maya Aguinaldo

Who Plays Maya in Black Ops 7?

Maya has the street smarts to survive the real world, which is why the Dark Aether might not come as that much of a challenge for her. With Maya's brother avenged, she's sticking around with this new crew to further seal the bond. Witty and snarky, Maya's quick tongue is played once again by Chantelle Barry, who has a voice players might recognize as The Dowser in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach , and as Tzofi in The Chosen .

Keston John as Mackenzie Carver

Who Plays Carver in Black Ops 7?

Military excellence runs in Carver's DNA, which is why the dishonorable stripping of his rank remains a scar that fuels his rage against the undead. Carver fights to restore his reputation and keep his friends alive, and this protector needs to follow his own rules if he's to make it out of the Dark Aether. Keston John lends his talents to Carver, and players might recognize this actor for his work as Darnell James in In the Dark , as well as the voice and performance behind Tarsem in Avatar: The Way of Water .

Milo Ventimiglia as David Mason

Who Plays Section in Black Ops 7?

The protagonist of Black Ops 2 returns for the lead role in Black Ops 7 's Campaign, and to continue the legacy of Alex Mason. David was the Lieutenant Commander who aided in the capture and killing of Raul Menendez, the canon ending to Black Ops 2 . Codenamed Section, David continues to work in the US Military under his own unit, Specter One, with his scars beginning to surface. Milo Ventimiglia is David Mason, a new casting for the character, but fans might recognize his work as Jack Pearson in This Is Us and Peter Petrelli in Heroes .

Michael Rooker as Mike Harper

Who Plays Harper in Black Ops 7?

You can't have David Mason without his best bromance buddy, Mike Harper. Harper is a great friend and a loyal soldier who will always serve to fight another day. Harper's addicted to the heat of battle, and the adrenaline he feels is like no other when he's fighting for his country and what's right. This confidence, charm, and gung-ho attitude are returning features from the iconic Michael Rooker, who played the character previously in Black Ops 2 . Michael Rooker has extensive credits, such as Yondu in the Guardians of the Galaxy trilogy from James Gunn, and Merle Dixon from AMC's The Walking Dead .

John Eric Bentley as Eric Samules

Who Plays Samuels in Black Ops 7?

Samuels was once part of the Presidential protection team with the Secret Service, but his combat experience with Section made Samuels reevaluate his faith and what it means to be part of a team. Samuels is part of Section's new team in the Campaign, and his faith in his unit and their methods is sure to be tested again. Samuels may have had a minor role in Black Ops 2 , but fans of Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth might recognize John Eric Bentley behind the voice of Barret Wallace, and now, as Samuels.

Leilani "50/50" Tuuola

Who Plays 50/50 in Black Ops 7?

The final piece of the four-person team from Section is Leilani "50/50" Tuuola, a New Zealand native who joins the crew as another confident soldier ready to serve. The future is definitely here with this character, who has cybernetic implants and limbs that are sure to pack a powerful punch. The performance of Leilani "50/50" Tuuola comes from Frankie Adams, who plays Candy in The Lost Flowers of Alice Hart , and Yasmina Rashid in Mortal Engines (2018).

Kiernan Shipka as Emma Kagan

Who Plays Kagan in Black Ops 7?

As the CEO of The Guild, it's expected that Emma Kagan is up to some pretty shady dealings and experiments. Obsessed with redefining the future and surpassing the limitations of humanity, Kagan serves the best interests of The Guild, and the allegiances of those interests remain to be seen. Kiernan Shipka plays Emma Kagan, a veteran actor who has played iconic characters like Sally Draper in Mad Men and Sabrina Spellman in Netflix's Chilling Adventures of Sabrina .

Jesse Corti as Menendez

Who Plays Menendez in Black Ops 7?

Canonically, Menendez was killed in Black Ops 2 , which makes his reappearance a chilling shock. As the leader of Cordis Die, Menendez is now a martyr, and a man who would stop at nothing until America crumbled against its own politics. Menendez's capacity and importance remain to be seen, but what is known is who's behind the performance. Kamar de los Reyes will not return as Menendez, as the actor tragically passed in 2023. For Black Ops 7 , Menendez will have his performance done by Jesse Corti, who provided the voice of Deadman in Death Stranding , and Lefou in Beauty and the Beast (1991).

Call of Duty: Black Ops 7

item.title: Silksong: All Needolin Door Locations
item.description:
Needolin Doors in Hollow Knight: Silksong , as the name suggests, require the Needolin ability to open and access the Weavenest areas behind them. Although that is the case for most, some might require additional abilities on top of Needolin to reach the door itself.

Only one of these doors is required for the main story, while the others have a tool or ability behind them that players must collect if they are aiming for 100% completion. The guide below includes maps and information about their locations in Hollow Knight: Silksong .

All Needolin Door Locations in Silksong

Weavenest Karn

  • Location : Wormways
  • Requirement : Needolin + Faydown Cloak or Clawline

This Needolin door is located to the left of Bone Bottom , but you will have to reach the Wormways first, which is accessible through the left of The Marrow . The path to Wormways is locked, and you will need a Simple Key to head inside.

The easiest way to get a key early in the game is to buy it from Pebb for 500 Rosaries , which you can farm next to the Marrow bench to the left. Once inside, head to the far left, then head up and left again to find the door. Inside the Weavenest Karn , you will only find the Sharpdart Ability .

Weavenest Atla

  • Location : Moss Grotto
  • Requirement : Needolin

To reach this gate, head back to the starting area, which is Moss Grotto , and as you are falling down, take the first right. Go past the flying enemies, and you will find the door to Weavenest Atla . This area actually counts as a separate location and has its own map. Once you activate the mechanism in the middle and go down, you can head left to find Snare Setter , a Spool Fragment , and a boss encounter with two Mossmothers .

On the right is a series of breakable walls that lead to Eva, who can upgrade your Hunter Crest and increase slots if you have gathered enough Memory Lockets. The final upgrade unlocks Sylphsong , which is an ability that regenerates Silk whenever you sit on a bench.

Weavenest Cindril

  • Location : Far Fields
  • Requirement : Needolin

From the location where you acquire the Drifter's Cloak , head further right, and at the end of the path, you will find the Needolin door leading to Weavenest Cindril . After resting at the bench, dash to the other end of the room to get the Silkspeed Anklets . If you do not dash, the tool will not pop up.

Once you acquire the Anklets , equip them and also equip the Flea Brew tool. Use the Brew to increase your speed even more and run past the plates, lighting all of them, which will reveal a hidden area below that leads to a Rune Harp , a Relic.

Weavenest Murglin

  • Location : Bilewater
  • Requirement : Needolin

Weavenest Murglin is located to the far right of Bilewater . If you entered this area through Sinner's Path , then you can head to the far right, where you will find the door. If you have acquired the map for the area, then you can easily pinpoint the location on the map.

Inside the area, you can find the Ruined Tool on top of the table. This is a broken tool that can be forged into one of three different versions at three different locations. All three forges will cost you a Craftmetal , but the outcome is quite different.

Weavenest Absolom

  • Location : The Abyss
  • Requirement : Needolin

This is part of the main story, when you will have to go all the way to the right of the Abyss . Behind the door, you can find Farsight to the far right, which is an item that tells you your completion %. After that, you can go to the bottom of this area to find the Silk Soar ability.

42
9.0 /10

Hollow Knight: Silksong

item.title: Genshin Impact: How To Get Vitalized Dragontooth
item.description:
Players will discover many secrets while exploring Dragonspine in Genshin Impact . One of them is the strange red core pulsing with energy in the middle of the area, which can be used to infuse powers into normal Strange Tooth . Travelers are rewarded with a weapon at the end, but they need to gather materials first to craft it.

Updated September 19, 2025, by Nahda Nabiilah: The Dragonspine Spear is one of the many polearms Travelers can obtain early game in Genshin Impact. However, unlike other weapons where you usually need to save some Primogems to get them, the Dragonspine Spear is crafted by collecting special materials called Vitalized Dragontooth and unlocking the correct blueprint for it. Other than that, players will also need to collect a lot of Starsilver and some Mora to create the polearm.

Strange Tooth Locations In Genshin Impact

Four Strange Teeth can be found across Dragonspine, and they reappear after roughly two days. Players hoping to craft a Dragonspine Spear should buckle up for what will likely be a week-long endeavor. And if planning on refining their Dragonspine Spear, Travelers should expect several weeks of doing a big lap of Dragonspine. Here are all the strange teeth locations:

  • Strange Tooth 1: Look for torches; there will be a tooth nearby.
  • Strange Tooth 2: Look for a small island north of Dragonspine.
  • Strange Tooth 3: Inside Wyrmrest Valley Red Cave.
  • Strange Tooth 4: Near the water on the floor.

How To Make Vitalized Dragontooth In Genshin Impact

Players can obtain a Vitalized Dragontooth by taking a Strange Tooth to the Core found in Wyrmrest Vallet. Once a player has found four of the "Strange Tooth" items, they should head to the hidden Core found in Wyrmrest Valley, which is part of the Dragonspine region.

Once there, simply interact with the large heart-like entity to create the Vitalized Dragontooth after defeating the waves of Fatui. With eight in hand and the blueprints for a Dragonspine Spear , players can simply head to either of the game's current blacksmiths and forge their powerful new four-star weapon.

Of course, the Vitalized Dragontooth is only one of the ingredients required by the Dragonspine Spear blueprints, and players will need all of them to successfully forge one of the polearms. The other forging requirements are 50 Starsilver (also found throughout Dragonspine), 500 Mora , and a Northlander Polearm Billet, aka Northlander Polearm Prototype.

The Dragonspine Spear in Genshin Impact

The Dragonspine Spear was introduced to Genshin Impact alongside the Frostbearer (catalyst) and the Snow-Tombed Starsilver (claymore) alongside Dragonspine. Those who have already finished the Festering Fang questline that's meant to introduce the region will have also already at least heard of the fabled Dragonspine Spear.

All three of these weapons share the passive ability "Frost Burial," which allows the user a chance to generate a powerful Cryo DMG-dealing icicle upon successful Normal or Charged Attacks. Despite this shared ability though, the three weapons in the Dragonspine Series are obtained in entirely unique ways. The Dragonspine Spear requires a blueprint, and can then be forged with the help of eight Vitalized Dragonteeth.

232
9.2 /10
8 /10

Genshin Impact

item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign Adding New Feature to Deep of Night Mode
item.description:
Elden Ring Nightreign is adding a new feature to its Deep of Night mode that could make the experience more accessible for more players. The Elden Ring Nightreign update will also fix some issues with the mode, and add some additional quality-of-life features that fans may appreciate.

FromSoftware soulslikes have always been notorious for their difficulty, but that hasn't stopped the developer from giving fans even more intense challenges to face. The latest example of this is the Elden Ring Nightreign Deep of Night mode, which launched on September 11. This Elden Ring Nightreign mode randomizes elements like terrain and which Nightlord the players will face, and increases the difficulty level depending on how far players progress. However, FromSoftware will add something that will make the game more enjoyable for those who would prefer a slightly less punishing experience.

Elden Ring Nightreign Deep of Night Mode Introduces Decreasing Depth

On September 19, Elden Ring Nightreign released a notice of new quality of life changes coming to the high-difficulty Deep of Night mode. Once the update arrives, players will be able to voluntarily decrease their Depth ranking by one level. Further, when players reach Depth level 3 and beyond, they will receive demotion protection, so that in the event of a defeat, they won't lose their rank. This effect will apply to a single defeat on Depth level 3, and two defeats for Depths 4 and 5. Depth level 1 players who are matched with higher rank characters in Depth level 2 expeditions and beyond will no longer lose points if defeated, and Steam players will be able to keep playing in the event of Steam servers disconnecting.

Many players are already celebrating the upcoming changes. In particular, the ability to voluntarily reduce one's Depth level has seen a lot of appreciation from the game community. In discussions about the patch, some fans have noted that they enjoy the passives and additions available in the game mode, or like testing unusual builds, but don't want to go to higher Depths due to the increasing difficulty. Others simply indicated that while Depths 4-5 are playable, they prefer sticking with 1-3 for a less punishing experience. This addition may also help to cut down on players intentionally failing runs in an effort to return to a less difficult Depth, which could be extremely frustrating for Elden Ring Nightreign multiplayer partners who are trying to take the challenge as far as it goes.

In addition, any players who have been frustrated at their Depth level ranking not increasing correctly after a win will be pleased to know that this bug will be fixed with the coming patch. A release date for the popular co-op game's next update hasn't yet been announced, but FromSoftware says it will announce it as soon as possible.

21
8.7 /10
9 /10

Elden Ring Nightreign
